item.title: Predicting property prices
item.description: 1 Summary 2 Business question 3 Dataset description 3.1 Missing values 3.2 Variable creation 3.3 Correlation 4 Motivation for tool 5 Steps 5.1 Splitting the data 5.2 Training the model 5.3 Revising variable importance 5.4 Evaluating the model 5.5 Tuning hyperparameters 5.6 Checking the error on the optimised model 6 Result 7 Interpretation 1 Summary To see the code used in this post, visit my kernel on kaggle in R Markdown format.
